resources.string: This is where I can enter a bio about myself so that you can learn more about me professionally! I am a really interesting person and also I have a lot of good qualities that make me hireable. Now, I can add Android development to my resume.

This is where I can enter a bio about myself so that you can learn more about me personally! I like to spend my free time eating, hanging out with my friends, and learning about mobile app development!
